title: Part One: The Bastards Who Killed the Black Panthers
itunes:title: Part One: The Bastards Who Killed the Black Panthers
description:
Robert is joined by political activist, poet, and podcaster, Propaganda to discuss the monsters who murdered the Black Panthers.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. New Documents Reveal FBI Secretly Monitored Protests, Feared ‘Black Supremacist’ Attack
  2. Black Panther leader Fred Hampton, assassinated on this day in 1969, explains how the ruling class uses racism to exploit working people.
  3. The most radical thing the Black Panthers did was give kids free breakfast
  4. How the FBI Conspired to Destroy the Black Panther Party
  5. The Black Panthers’ 10-Point Program
  6. The social perception created by the Black Panthers
  7. The Founders of the Black Panther Party: Huey P. Newton and Bobby Seale
  8. The Secret History of Guns
  9. The Radical Origins of Free Breakfast for Children
  10. Survival Programs
  11. F.B.I. SOUGHT DOOM OF PANTHER PARTY
  12. Yesterday’s Crimes: The Living Martyrdom of Huey Newton
  13. THE RISE AND FALL OF THE BLACK PANTHERS
  14. Black Panther Fred Hampton Created a "Rainbow Coalition" to Support Poor Americans
  15. The Black Panther Raid and the death of Fred Hampton
  16. When the black justice movement got too powerful, the FBI got scared and got ugly
  17. Black against Empire: The History and Politics of the Black Panther Party 
  18. A timeline of the rise and fall of the Black Panthers

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
